title: Kazuyoshi Matsunaga
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Matsunaga was born in <a href="Nakatsu%2C%20Oita">Nakatsu</a> on November 13, 1977. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> in 1996. Although he played several matches as forward, he could not play many matches. In 2000, he moved to <a href="Avispa%20Fukuoka">Avispa Fukuoka</a>. However he could hardly play in the match. In 2001, he moved to <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a> club <a href="Estrela%20Miyazaki">Profesor Miyazaki</a>. The club was promoted to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League">Japan Football League</a> (JFL) from 2002. In 2002, he moved to Singapore club <a href="Jurong%20FC">Jurong</a>. In 2002, he returned to Profesor Miyazaki. In 2003, he moved to JFL club <a href="Tochigi%20SC">Tochigi SC</a>. He played as regular player in 2 seasons. In 2005, he moved to JFL club <a href="Kataller%20Toyama">ALO's Hokuriku</a>. However he could hardly play in the match. In 2006, he moved to Regional Leagues club <a href="Banditonce%20Kakogawa">Banditonce Kobe</a>. In 2007, he moved to <a href="Mitsubishi%20Mizushima%20FC">Mitsubishi Mizushima</a>. He retired end of 2008 season.
